name: Unplatform
description:
A simple platformer and "reverse" metroidvania made for BYOG 2020. You start off with various different movement abilities - Jump, Double Jump and Wall Jump - but you lose them as the game progresses.

As your character unlearns these abilities and still manages to progress can you also unlearn your assumptions about platformers to win the game?

Controls:
Movement : Left Arrow / Right Arrow or A / D
Jump : Space bar. Tap for short jump, Hold for high jump.

Made by :
Ujwal Kumar
Font and sprites from Kenney.nl
